title: Hammer
description: When I headed west knowing the only way to survive was to start over, I never imagined I’d end up fighting for my life again.The road has been my constant companion. When I found a new home with the Heartlands club, for the first time I felt things might change for me.What I didn’t count on was finding something…no, someone, I’d fight for harder than I would for myself. She’s wandered into Seneca with a law degree and a vision for a future that sure doesn’t include a road worn brute like me.She can take care of herself, but I want to do it for her. When the threats come my way, and she becomes a pawn used against me? All bets are off and I’m in for the fight of my life.
author: Dani Wyatt
